DOC.detailed_description: The aim prospective randomize GOELAMS LLC 98 trial report compare two therapeutic strategy previously untreated B C Binet stag B-CLL patient less 60 year old . Conventional chemotherapy ( Arm A ) consist six monthly course CHOP , i.e . vincristin IV 1 mg/m2 day 1 , doxorubicin IV 25 mg/m2 day 1 , cyclophosphamide ( Cy ) 300 mg/m2 prednisone 40 mg/m2 give orally day 1 day 5 , follow 6 CHOP course every 3 month case response . Fludarabine ( 25 mg/m2 /d IV 5 consecutive day ) use case non response ( stable disease progression ) 3 CHOP course . This conventional therapy compare high dose therapy autologous CD34+ purify progenitor cell support ( Arm B ) , use consolidation Complete Remission ( CR ) Very Good Partial Response ( VGPR , define > 50 % tumoral response bone marrow lymphocyte infiltration < 30 % ) obtain 3 monthly course CHOP . In absence CR VGPR , 3 6 monthly-courses fludarabine perform mobilization Cy 4 g/m2 + G-CSF administration . The condition regimen include TBI 12 Gy Cy 60 mg /kg /d 2 day .
